title: Generative AI-Integrated Pedagogical Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Small group of language education professionals with limited generative AI tool experience but high motivation to learn

learning_goals: Learners analyze the educational potential of generative AI (GenAI) and develop three or more scenarios applicable to lesson design
Learners identify ethical issues that may arise when integrating generative AI into asynchronous online discussions and propose solutions
Learners prototype and incorporate peer feedback into two or more language education activities using generative AI tools like ChatGPT

resources: Database of AI applications for language education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
